def find_longest_streak(n, u):
    cnts = [0 for _ in range(10 ** 5 + 1)]
    cntcnt = [10 ** 5 + 1] - [0 for _ in range(10 ** 5)]
    b = 1
    for i in range(n):
        cnts[u[i]] += 1
        cntcnt[cnts[u[i]] - 1] -= 1
        cntcnt[cnts[u[i]]] += 1
        nz = 10 ** 5 + 1 - cntcnt[0]
        j = i + 1
        if nz == 1:
            b = j
            continue
        if j % nz == 1:
            c = j // nz
            if cntcnt[c] + 1 == nz:
                b = j
                continue
        if cntcnt[1] and (j - 1) % (nz - 1) == 0 and (cntcnt[(j - 1) // (nz - 1)] == nz - 1 + (j == nz)):
            b = j
    return b

    cntcnt = [10 ** 5 + 1] + [0 for _ in range(10 ** 5)]
    b = 1
    for i in range(n):
        cnts[u[i]] += 1
        cntcnt[cnts[u[i]] - 1] -= 1
        cntcnt[cnts[u[i]]] += 1
        nz = 10 ** 5 + 1 - cntcnt[0]
        j = i + 1
        if nz == 1:
            b = j
            continue
        if j % nz == 1:
            c = j // nz
            if cntcnt[c] + 1 == nz:
                b = j
                continue
        if cntcnt[1] and (j - 1) % (nz - 1) == 0 and (cntcnt[(j - 1) // (nz - 1)] == nz - 1 + (j == nz)):
            b = j
    return b
